name: Dolus and the Labyrinth
description: Dolus is a thief who makes a living pilfering from the decayed ruins of the last war. He's found a multitude of mystic treasures in his past but none compare to the mysterious Phase ability he finds in the throne room of a large, overgrown castle. However, the castle's owner, the great sorcerer Magnus, is awaken from his slumber by Dolus' intrusion as is the labyrinth-like castle itself! As the walls shift and reform to trap Dolus in a seemingly never-ending maze, Magnus' ghost hunts him slowly. You'll have to master Dolus' new-found Phase ability to fly through small walls and activate switches and keys . As both Magnus and his labyrinth try to thwart your escape you'll have to turn the tides on them by learning the magical mechanisms that operate the moving walls and traps and manipulating them for yourselves!
